column1: Enable JS and HTML bundling and minifying for checkout page
column2: Enable JS and HTML bundling and minifying for checkout page

column1: Up to 30% faster checkout page load time and up to twice smaller bandwidth consumption due to reduced resources size.
column2: Up to 30% faster checkout page load time and up to twice smaller bandwidth consumption due to reduced resources size.

column1: How it works: the concept is similar to caching. Initially, checkout page starts loading with bundling disabled, but as soon as all files are loaded, all js and html files get minified and merged into one, so that the next time the page loads faster.
column2: How it works: the concept is similar to caching. Initially, checkout page starts loading with bundling disabled, but as soon as all files are loaded, all js and html files get minified and merged into one, so that the next time the page loads faster.
